meaning: place on the head, receive, top of head, top, summit, peak

onyomiExamples.meaning: top of the head, vertex, parietal
tip of a stem (of a plant)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to receive, to get, to accept, to take, to buy, to eat, to drink, to be crowned with, to wear (on one's head), to have (on top), to have (as one's leader), to live under (a ruler), to install (a president), to get somebody to do something
crown (of head), summit (of mountain), spire, easy win for one, something received
thank you (for the meal just served), I receive (this meal)
